text: Tom Cotton (born May 13, 1977) is the junior United States Senator from Arkansas. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party. Cotton has been in Senate since January 3, 2015. He was in the United States House of Representatives from 2013 to 2015. Cotton was born on May 13, 1977 in Dardanelle, Arkansas. He graduated from the Harvard University and attended, but did not graduate from, Claremont Graduate University. He is married to Jaime Gardner. They have one child. In January 2016, Cotton became the first sitting United States senator to support Bernie Sanders for President of the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Tom Cotton, U.S. Senator for Arkansas, Home Page Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from Arkansas Category:Harvard University alumni Category:United States representatives from Arkansas Category:United States senators from Arkansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Tom Cotton
